headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Q3 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Crown Castle (CCI) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

content.title: Crown Castle (CCI) Q3 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
content.summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Crown Castle (CCI) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Crown Castle raises annual site rental revenue forecast on robust demand
summary: Crown Castle derives majority of its revenue from leasing out tower infrastructure to U.S. wireless carriers such as AT&T, T-Mobile US, and Verizon Communications on a long-term basis.  With about 40,000 cellular towers across the U.S., Crown Castle is looking to focus on growing its tower business, which is expected to benefit from the largest U.S. carriers upgrading their networks to 5G and increasing capacity to meet booming data demand.  The real estate investment trust now sees annual site rental revenue in the range of $4.01 billion to $4.05 billion, compared with its earlier projection of between $4 billion and $4.04 billion.

headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Q3 FFO and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +7.69% and +1.98%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

content.title: Crown Castle (CCI) Q3 FFO and Revenues Beat Estimates
content.summary: Crown Castle (CCI) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +7.69% and +1.98%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Crown Castle: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results beat Wall Street expectations. The Houston-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $490 million, or $1.12 per share, in the period. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $1.04 per share.

content.summary: The results beat Wall Street expectations. The Houston-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $490 million, or $1.12 per share, in the period. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $1.04 per share.

headline: Crown Castle Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results and Increases Outlook for Full Year 2025
summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE: CCI) ("Crown Castle") today reported results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025 and updated its full year 2025 Outlook, as reflected in the table below.
